NSWindow  cascadingReferenceFrame Instance PropertycascadingReferenceFramemacOS 15.0+@MainActor
var cascadingReferenceFrame: NSRect { get }DiscussionThe frame to use when cascading or sizing a new window based on the receiver’s position or size. This may be different from frame when the receiver is positioned by the system.

# cascadingReferenceFrame | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AppKit ](/documentation/appkit)

- [ NSWindow ](/documentation/appkit/nswindow)

- [ cascadingReferenceFrame ](/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/cascadingReferenceFrame)

- [ NSWindow ](/documentation/appkit/nswindow)

-  cascadingReferenceFrame 

Instance Property# cascadingReferenceFrame

macOS 15.0+

```
@MainActor
var cascadingReferenceFrame: NSRect { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/cascadingReferenceFrame#discussion)

The frame to use when cascading or sizing a new window based on the receiver’s position or size. This may be different from `frame` when the receiver is positioned by the system.
